name: LianjaX
body:
### Welcome to LianjaX
LianjaX is an Open Source Community for sharing Libraries, Tools, and Templates created for use with Lianja.  

The Libraries, Tools and Templates made available here are all open source licensed under the Apache 2 OSS license. Any Lianja developer can join and become a member of LianjaX, help and propose new LianjaX projects, and generally work towards a common goal of building a collection of useful open source technologies to help others become more productive in Lianja.
 
### Getting Started
The built-in GIT instructions for getting started, at http://help.github.com/ are very good and easy to follow. Once Git is installed, Scott Chacon's ***Pro Git*** is a great book, and is available online at http://git-scm.com/book.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with LianjaX? contact us at support@lianja.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
tagline: LianjaX is a place for the Lianja Community to share Libraries, Tools, and Templates created for use with Lianja.  All software contained here is licensed under the Apache 2 OSS license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
